en: I have a flat nose.
zh: 我是塌鼻子。

en: This car fits five.
zh: 这辆车能坐五个人。

en: Can you wait for me in the car?
zh: 你能在车里等我吗？

en: Are you cold? Come to my arms, I'll warm you up.
zh: 你冷吗？来我怀里，我给你暖和暖和。

en: I don't know what you're saying.
zh: 我不知道你在说什么。

en: I've got a cold sore on my lip.
zh: 我嘴唇上长了唇疱疹。

en: I'm scared to make a mistake.
zh: 我害怕犯错。

en: I have a ton of stuff to do.
zh: 我有一大堆事情要做。

en: I got a mouth ulcer again.
zh: 我又长口疮了。

en: I hate making mistakes.
zh: 我讨厌犯错。

en: Why do kids get sick so easily?
zh: 为什么小孩子这么容易生病？

en: When I was a little kid, I didn't like the dark at all.
zh: 我小时候特别怕黑。

en: I went swimming in the ocean.
zh: 我去海里游泳了。

en: When I was little, I couldn't go to the bathroom by myself in the middle of the night, so I always had to wake up my sister.
zh: 我小时候半夜不敢自己去厕所，总是要叫醒我姐姐。

en: There are so many things I want to do.
zh: 我想做的事情太多了。

en: I put the leftovers in the fridge.
zh: 我把剩菜放冰箱里了。

en: I put the leftovers in the refrigerator.
zh: 我把剩菜放冰箱里了。

en: Tom is a bed-wetter.
zh: 汤姆尿床。

en: I haven't been to work. I've stayed at home all day.
zh: 我没去上班，在家待了一整天。

en: We're taking piano lessons.
zh: 我们在上钢琴课。

en: It sucks having a cold.
zh: 感冒真难受。

en: Tom ordered everything on the menu.
zh: 汤姆把菜单上的所有东西都点了。

en: That train doesn't stop here.
zh: 那趟火车不在这里停。

en: It can be reached only by sea.
zh: 只能通过海路到达。

en: You can get there only by sea.
zh: 你只能通过海路到达那里。

en: Do you mean that you've never seen a panda?
zh: 你的意思是说你从来没见过熊猫吗？

en: Tom ate very little.
zh: 汤姆吃得很少。

en: Are the only electromagnetic wavelengths that humans can directly perceive the light we see using our eyes and infrared radiation that warms our skin?
zh: 人类可以直接感知到的唯一电磁波长是不是我们用眼睛看到的光和温暖我们皮肤的红外线？

en: I wasn't yet asleep at that time.
zh: 那时我还没睡着。

en: I'm going to Boston in the summer.
zh: 我夏天要去波士顿。

en: I met Tom in the winter a number of years ago.
zh: 几年前的冬天我遇到了汤姆。

en: I totally agree with you on that point.
zh: 我完全同意你的观点。

en: I dozed off in class.
zh: 我在课堂上打了个盹。

en: Music sounds slower when you're running.
zh: 跑步的时候，音乐听起来会变慢。

en: When you listen to music while running, it sounds slower.
zh: 跑步时听音乐，音乐听起来会变慢。

en: Things that modify nouns are prototypically adjectives or equivalent to adjectives.
zh: 修饰名词的东西通常是形容词或等同于形容词的东西。

en: Both Tom and I are members of that club.
zh: 汤姆和我都是那个俱乐部的成员。

en: Both Tom and I were members of that club.
zh: 汤姆和我都是那个俱乐部的成员。

en: There's no one in that room.
zh: 那个房间里没有人。

en: There's nobody in that room.
zh: 那个房间里没有人。

en: Do you have your student ID card?
zh: 你有你的学生证吗？

en: I can't help you because I'm too busy.
zh: 我太忙了，帮不了你。

en: Onions cook faster than potatoes.
zh: 洋葱比土豆熟得快。

en: Just looking at Tom, you can tell that he likes you.
zh: 只要看看汤姆，你就能知道他喜欢你。

en: I got this from Tom.
zh: 我从汤姆那里得到的这个。

en: Even though Tom has a lot of money, he's not happy.
zh: 即使汤姆有很多钱，他也不快乐。

en: Even though Tom has a lot of money, he isn't happy.
zh: 即使汤姆有很多钱，他也不快乐。

en: Even though Tom is rich, he's not happy.
zh: 即使汤姆很富有，他也不快乐。

en: Even though Tom is rich, he isn't happy.
zh: 即使汤姆很富有，他也不快乐。

en: Although Tom is rich, he's not happy.
zh: 虽然汤姆很富有，但他并不快乐。

en: Tom is rich. However, he's not happy.
zh: 汤姆很富有。然而，他并不快乐。

en: It's true that I was madly in love with Mary.
zh: 我的确曾经疯狂地爱着玛丽。

en: Let's wait here until Tom comes back.
zh: 咱们在这儿等着，直到汤姆回来。

en: What time do you think Tom will come back?
zh: 你觉得汤姆几点会回来？

en: We couldn't help but think that Tom was dead.
zh: 我们忍不住认为汤姆已经死了。

en: I want to get a midnight snack, but I can't go to the kitchen.
zh: 我想吃点夜宵，但是我不能去厨房。

en: Wolves are not as smart as foxes.
zh: 狼不如狐狸聪明。

en: "I'm studying Japanese." "Really? Cool!"
zh: “我在学日语。”“真的吗？酷！”

en: As a poor student, I used to listen to the records which I had managed to get until they wore out.
zh: 作为一个穷学生，我过去常常听我好不容易弄到的唱片，直到它们磨损。

en: When I was in middle school, I was talking with my therapist, and we had such a great talk that I thought "Maybe there's something between us", and I tried to get a kiss. But she gave me the cold shoulder and told me to stop. It was at this moment I knew I had screwed up.
zh: 我上初中的时候，和我的心理医生聊天，我们聊得非常好，以至于我心想“也许我们之间有什么”，然后我就想亲她。但是她对我爱理不理，让我停止。就在那一刻，我知道我搞砸了。

en: "I had a dream where you fell off a skyscraper." "Whoa, don't be arbitrarily killing others now!"
zh: “我做了一个梦，梦见你从摩天大楼上掉下来了。”“哇，别随便杀人啊！”

en: In middle school, I was talking with my therapist, and seeing as we were having such a great talk, I suddenly thought "There's a chance", and I tried to get a kiss. But she told me to stop. Then, as I headed to my next class, I felt so embarrassed.
zh: 上初中的时候，我和我的心理医生聊天，看我们聊得这么好，我突然觉得“有机会”，然后我就想亲她。但是她让我停止。然后，当我走向下一节课的时候，我感到非常尴尬。

en: There isn't much to tell you.
zh: 没什么好告诉你的。

en: Yesterday was awfully hot.
zh: 昨天热得要命。

en: It was awfully hot yesterday.
zh: 昨天热得要命。

en: It can't be fixed.
zh: 这没法修了。

en: It can't be corrected.
zh: 这没法改正了。

en: It seems that Tom used to be a great athlete.
zh: 看来汤姆以前是个很棒的运动员。

en: The terrible scene made Tom shudder.
zh: 可怕的景象让汤姆不寒而栗。

en: I want to get back together with the boyfriend I broke up with.
zh: 我想和分手的男朋友复合。

en: At last, he arrived at the Well of Despair.
zh: 他终于到达了绝望之井。

en: I was confused by the expression on Tom's face.
zh: 汤姆脸上的表情让我感到困惑。

en: Every member but me believes what Tom says.
zh: 除了我以外，每个成员都相信汤姆说的话。

en: I met Tom in the winter three years ago.
zh: 三年前的冬天，我遇到了汤姆。

en: Things that modify nouns are adjectives or equivalent to adjectives.
zh: 修饰名词的东西是形容词或相当于形容词的东西。

en: Wolves aren't as smart as foxes.
zh: 狼不如狐狸聪明。

en: Within a month of going abroad, Tom became sick.
zh: 汤姆出国不到一个月就生病了。

en: I hear that Tom is in the hospital now.
zh: 我听说汤姆现在在医院。

en: I'll speak slowly.
zh: 我会慢慢说。

en: The vase that Tom broke is Mary's.
zh: 汤姆打碎的花瓶是玛丽的。

en: The vase Tom broke is Mary's.
zh: 汤姆打碎的花瓶是玛丽的。

en: There's little hope of Tom getting well soon.
zh: 汤姆很快康复的希望渺茫。

en: "Are you Spanish?" "No, but I can speak Spanish."
zh: “你是西班牙人吗？”“不是，但我会说西班牙语。”

en: I want to have a baby with you.
zh: 我想和你生个孩子。

en: Is this today's newspaper?
zh: 这是今天的报纸吗？

en: How many kanji characters are there?
zh: 有多少个汉字？

en: How many Chinese characters are there?
zh: 有多少个汉字？

en: How many kanji are there?
zh: 有多少个汉字？

en: Tom and Mary are fighting over who should be the driver.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽正在争论谁应该当司机。

en: I wish that Tom would stop smoking.
zh: 我希望汤姆戒烟。

en: There's a rumor that Tom got married.
zh: 有传言说汤姆结婚了。

en: I asked Tom to send us the book.
zh: 我让汤姆把书寄给我们。

en: I asked Tom to send the book to us.
zh: 我让汤姆把书寄给我们。

en: Once Tom starts talking, he's hard to stop.
zh: 汤姆一旦开始说话，就很难让他停下来。

en: Don't forget to buy some bread on your way home.
zh: 回家路上别忘了买些面包。

en: I wonder if Tom is staying at that hotel.
zh: 我想知道汤姆是否住在那家酒店。

en: Tom's father is Canadian.
zh: 汤姆的父亲是加拿大人。

en: Tom's hobby is collecting stamps.
zh: 汤姆的爱好是集邮。

en: As soon as Tom comes, we'll begin.
zh: 汤姆一来，我们就开始。

en: I thought I was going to have a nervous breakdown.
zh: 我当时觉得我都要精神崩溃了。

en: The content of this message goes against our rules and was therefore hidden. It is displayed only to admins and to the author of the message.
zh: 这条消息的内容违反了我们的规定，因此已被隐藏。它仅对管理员和消息作者显示。

en: You start receiving a good amount of pension when you're in college.
zh: 你上大学的时候就开始领到一笔不错的养老金。

en: In high school, the girl that I had a crush on had a crush on Tom.
zh: 高中时，我暗恋的那个女孩暗恋汤姆。

en: Do you know how to use an abacus?
zh: 你知道怎么用算盘吗？

en: You said Tom was kind and he certainly is, isn't he?
zh: 你说汤姆很善良，他的确是，不是吗？

en: When Tom was thirteen, he ran away from home.
zh: 汤姆十三岁的时候，他离家出走了。

en: We'll get a phone call from Tom tonight for sure.
zh: 我们今晚肯定会接到汤姆的电话。

en: There's nothing more fun for me to do than to talk with Tom.
zh: 对我来说，没有什么比和汤姆聊天更有趣的了。

en: Since I'd never met Tom before, I didn't know him.
zh: 因为我以前从未见过汤姆，所以我不认识他。

en: A man as diligent as Tom is, is sure to succeed.
zh: 像汤姆这样勤奋的人，一定会成功的。

en: In spite of the fact that Tom is thirty, he's still dependent on his parents.
zh: 尽管汤姆三十岁了，但他仍然依赖父母。

en: I admire Tom's efforts.
zh: 我钦佩汤姆的努力。

en: Tomorrow, I have plans to go to Boston.
zh: 明天我计划去波士顿。

en: I'd like you to translate this book into French.
zh: 我想让你把这本书翻译成法语。

en: I have the feeling that I've answered this before.
zh: 我感觉我以前回答过这个问题。

en: How many drinks have you had tonight?
zh: 你今晚喝了几杯了？

en: If it hadn't been for Tom's help, I'd have failed.
zh: 如果不是汤姆的帮助，我早就失败了。

en: Tom's rudeness made me angry.
zh: 汤姆的粗鲁让我很生气。

en: Tom's rude reply provoked Mary to slap his face.
zh: 汤姆粗鲁的回答激怒了玛丽，她扇了他的脸。

en: For me, there's nothing more fun to do than to talk with Tom.
zh: 对我来说，没有什么比和汤姆聊天更有趣的了。

en: In my opinion, Tom is just a fool.
zh: 在我看来，汤姆只是个傻瓜。

en: Tom's request is very reasonable.
zh: 汤姆的要求非常合理。

en: Our school has accepted three Canadians as exchange students.
zh: 我们学校已经接受了三名加拿大人作为交换生。

en: Our school accepted three Canadians as exchange students.
zh: 我们学校接受了三名加拿大人作为交换生。

en: Unfortunately, none of my Japanese friends are learning German, but one of them is learning Russian.
zh: 很遗憾，我的日本朋友中没有人在学德语，但有一个人在学俄语。

en: I am you.
zh: 我就是你。

en: You came by car, right?
zh: 你是开车来的，对吧？

en: We waited a long time, but Tom didn't show up.
zh: 我们等了很久，但是汤姆没有出现。

en: I'd like to tell Mary that I love her.
zh: 我想告诉玛丽我爱她。

en: I'd like to tell Mary I love her.
zh: 我想告诉玛丽我爱她。

en: With the exception of Tom, nobody else came to the party.
zh: 除了汤姆，没有人来参加聚会。

en: Tom was the only one who came to the party.
zh: 汤姆是唯一一个来参加聚会的人。

en: I wonder who the people I saw Tom with were.
zh: 我想知道我看到汤姆在一起的人是谁。

en: They discussed Tom's proposals at the meeting.
zh: 他们在会议上讨论了汤姆的提议。

en: We waited a long time, but Tom never showed up again.
zh: 我们等了很久，但是汤姆再也没有出现。

en: It's possible that Tom came here when he was young.
zh: 汤姆年轻的时候可能来过这里。

en: It's possible Tom came here when he was young.
zh: 汤姆年轻的时候可能来过这里。

en: Tom's goal is to become a teacher.
zh: 汤姆的目标是成为一名老师。

en: Although Tom lives nearby, I rarely see him.
zh: 虽然汤姆住在附近，但我很少见到他。

en: Even though Tom lives nearby, I hardly ever see him.
zh: 即使汤姆住在附近，我也几乎没见过他。

en: Tom's mother is a wonderful pianist.
zh: 汤姆的妈妈是一位很棒的钢琴家。

en: I want to send Tom a present for his birthday.
zh: 我想送给汤姆一份生日礼物。

en: Are you going to bed for today?
zh: 你今天准备睡觉了吗？

en: "You invited Tom to the amusement park, didn't you? What did he say?" "That he can't because he's busy. He's no fun."
zh: “你邀请汤姆去游乐园了，对吧？他怎么说？”“他说他不能去，因为他很忙。他真没劲。”

en: Almost no one showed up at my new club's first meeting. But I'm not worried, since it'll all work out somehow.
zh: 我的新社团第一次聚会几乎没有人来。但我并不担心，总会有办法的。

en: Tom didn't open the door for me.
zh: 汤姆没有给我开门。

en: I can't believe I fought with Tom over something so stupid! God, I feel sick to my stomach.
zh: 我真不敢相信我竟然为了这么愚蠢的事情和汤姆吵架！天啊，我恶心死了。

en: My salary increased in February.
zh: 我的工资在二月份涨了。

en: I've been learning French for three years, and I still haven't even memorized the days of the week.
zh: 我已经学了三年法语了，可我甚至还没记住一周的每一天。

en: Until Tom comes, I can't go.
zh: 在汤姆来之前，我不能走。

en: Can I ask another question?
zh: 我可以再问一个问题吗？

en: Can I say it in French?
zh: 我可以用法语说吗？

en: After Tom's family moved to Australia, he started wetting the bed again.
zh: 汤姆一家搬到澳大利亚后，他又开始尿床了。

en: What did you do with Tom's clothes?
zh: 你把汤姆的衣服怎么处理了？

en: Are you still studying French every day?
zh: 你还在每天学习法语吗？

en: Tom's house is near the sea.
zh: 汤姆的房子靠近海边。

en: What has Tom done today?
zh: 汤姆今天做了什么？

en: Tom asked him some questions.
zh: 汤姆问了他一些问题。

en: Tom eats nothing but vegetables.
zh: 汤姆只吃蔬菜。

en: Tom is proud of his country.
zh: 汤姆为他的国家感到自豪。

en: Japanese is hard, isn't it?
zh: 日语很难，不是吗？

en: Japanese is hard.
zh: 日语很难。

en: Japanese is hard, don't you think?
zh: 日语很难，你不觉得吗？

en: I know this isn't an adequate answer to your question, but it's what I'll say for now.
zh: 我知道这不能完全回答你的问题，但这是我现在要说的。

en: French is hard, don't you think?
zh: 法语很难，你不觉得吗？

en: French is difficult, don't you think?
zh: 法语很困难，你不觉得吗？

en: French is hard.
zh: 法语很难。

en: Use this if you're in danger.
zh: 如果你遇到危险，就用这个。

en: I take off my shoes when I go in my house.
zh: 我进屋的时候会脱鞋。

en: You don't need to be scared.
zh: 你不需要害怕。

en: We take off our shoes when entering a house.
zh: 我们进屋的时候会脱鞋。

en: We take our shoes off when entering a house.
zh: 我们进屋的时候会脱鞋。

en: I think they're a little too small for you.
zh: 我觉得它们对你来说有点太小了。

en: What was that teacher's name? For some reason I can't remember.
zh: 那个老师叫什么名字？ 不知道为什么我记不起来了。

en: Spit it out now. You're going to swallow it.
zh: 现在就说出来，不然你就得咽下去了。

en: Those two make such a cute couple.
zh: 他们俩真是天生一对。

en: Those two are such a cute couple.
zh: 他们俩真是天生一对。

en: I think you should ask Tom that. He's better at French than I am.
zh: 我觉得你应该问问汤姆，他法语比我好。

en: We're looking for our cat.
zh: 我们在找我们的猫。

en: Tom didn't eat his fries.
zh: 汤姆没吃他的薯条。

en: Tom went to get Mary some water.
zh: 汤姆去给玛丽弄水喝了。

en: We haven't changed our plans.
zh: 我们还没有改变我们的计划。

en: Tom didn't let me do what I wanted to do.
zh: 汤姆没让我做我想做的事。

en: Don't forget to shut the door.
zh: 别忘了关门。

en: Green tea goes right through me.
zh: 我一喝绿茶就拉肚子。

en: Coffee goes right through me.
zh: 我一喝咖啡就拉肚子。

en: This really suits you.
zh: 这非常适合你。

en: Please show me your laptop.
zh: 请给我看看你的笔记本电脑。

en: I'm afraid to do it.
zh: 我害怕做这件事。

en: Did you go there?
zh: 你去过那里吗？

en: We named our oldest son after my grandfather.
zh: 我们用我祖父的名字给我们的大儿子命名。

en: You always wear a ponytail. Why not try pigtails every now and then?
zh: 你总是扎马尾辫，为什么不偶尔试试扎双马尾呢？

en: You always wear a ponytail. Why not try pigtails once in a while?
zh: 你总是扎马尾辫，为什么不偶尔试试扎双马尾呢？

en: Can you open this?
zh: 你能打开这个吗？

en: I'll go to school at seven.
zh: 我七点去上学。

en: Don't tell Mom.
zh: 别告诉妈妈。

en: Her only son died in the war.
zh: 她唯一的儿子在战争中去世了。

en: I'm tired of games.
zh: 我厌倦了游戏。

en: Well yes, but actually no.
zh: 嗯，算是吧，但其实又不是。

en: I gave up looking for a bathroom, and ran behind a tree in the nick of time.
zh: 我放弃找厕所了，及时跑到树后解决了。

en: What's the best way to get rid of mosquitoes?
zh: 有什么最好的方法可以驱蚊？

en: I gave up looking for a bathroom and quickly dashed behind a tree.
zh: 我放弃找厕所了，赶紧跑到树后解决了。

en: I can't get the lid off of the jam, could you do it for me?
zh: 我打不开这个果酱的盖子，你能帮我打开吗？

en: That was an awkward silence.
zh: 那真是令人尴尬的沉默。

en: My head hurt.
zh: 我头疼。

en: Have you ever been harassed?
zh: 你有没有被骚扰过？

en: For you, I'll gladly do it.
zh: 为了你，我很乐意做。

en: I live a busy life.
zh: 我的生活很忙碌。

en: Supposedly it's going to rain soon.
zh: 据说很快就要下雨了。

en: It was already dark, so I drove very slowly to be safe.
